calls.prompt:
Read this resume. Output ONLY valid JSON (no markdown, no explanation) - a list of skill keywords that this candidate claims expertise in.

For each skill, output a dict with:
- "keyword": the skill name (e.g., "JAX", "LLM post-training", "distributed systems")
- "resume_sources": list of exact quotes from resume that demonstrate this skill (bullet points, skills section entries, etc.)

Focus on technical skills relevant to ML/AI/systems engineering. Be specific - "JAX" not "programming".

Outpu...
calls.response: [{"keyword":"JAX","resume_sources":["JAX • PyTorch • XLA","Migrated training pipeline from PyTorch to JAX/Flax, implementing custom pjit sharding strategies (FSDP + tensor parallelism) that scaled Llama2-13B training to 64 A100 GPUs with 92% compute efficiency.","Implemented AlphaZero from scratch in JAX with jit-compiled MCTS and vectorized self-play. Achieved 50x speedup over naive Python through XLA fusion of tree search operations.","Optimized Stable Diffusion inference by analyzing XLA fusion patterns and implementing custom scheduling for UNet attention blocks, reducing sampling latency by 2.1x on single GPU."]},{"keyword":"PyTorch","resume_sources":["JAX • PyTorch • XLA","Migrated training pipeline from PyTorch to JAX/Flax"]},{"keyword":"XLA","resume_sources":["JAX • PyTorch • XLA","Debugged XLA compilation failures and memory OOM issues using HLO graph analysis; implemented custom sharding annotations to reduce peak memory by 40% on 70B parameter models.","Built distributed profiling tooling to trace per-device memory consumption and kernel execution timelines, identifying fusion opportunities that improved training step time by 18%.","Optimized Stable Diffusion inference by analyzing XLA fusion patterns and implementing custom scheduling for UNet attention blocks, reducing sampling latency by 2.1x on single GPU.","Implemented AlphaZero from scratch in JAX with jit-compiled MCTS and vectorized self-play. Achieved 50x speedup over naive Python through XLA fusion of tree search operations."]},{"keyword":"vLLM","resume_sources":["vLLM • TensorRT-LLM","Optimized inference serving with continuous batching and KV-cache memory management in vLLM; reduced P99 latency by 45% while increasing throughput 3x on A100 clusters."]},{"keyword":"TensorRT-LLM","resume_sources":["vLLM • TensorRT-LLM","Integrated TensorRT-LLM for production inference; implemented INT8 weight-only quantization and speculative decoding, reducing latency by 4x while maintaining <1% quality degradation."]},{"keyword":"HuggingFace Transformers","resume_sources":["HuggingFace Transformers"]},{"keyword":"Triton","resume_sources":["Triton • CUDA Runtime","Wrote custom Triton kernels for fused attention and RMSNorm, achieving 2.3x speedup over cuDNN baselines by optimizing shared memory tiling and register allocation."]},{"keyword":"CUDA Runtime","resume_sources":["Triton • CUDA Runtime"]},{"keyword":"NCCL","resume_sources":["NCCL • cuDNN","Profiled and optimized distributed LLM training across multi-node GPU clusters using NCCL collectives, reducing all-reduce communication overhead by 35% through gradient bucketing and overlap with compute."]},{"keyword":"cuDNN","resume_sources":["NCCL • cuDNN","Wrote custom Triton kernels for fused attention and RMSNorm, achieving 2.3x speedup over cuDNN baselines by optimizing shared memory tiling and register allocation."]},{"keyword":"NVIDIA Nsight","resume_sources":["NVIDIA Nsight • xprof"]},{"keyword":"xprof","resume_sources":["NVIDIA Nsight • xprof"]},{"keyword":"FSDP","resume_sources":["FSDP • DeepSpeed","FSDP + tensor parallelism"]},{"keyword":"DeepSpeed","resume_sources":["FSDP • DeepSpeed"]},{"keyword":"Tensor Parallelism","resume_sources":["Tensor/Pipeline Parallelism","FSDP + tensor parallelism"]},{"keyword":"Pipeline Parallelism","resume_sources":["Tensor/Pipeline Parallelism"]},{"keyword":"Gradient Checkpointing","resume_sources":["Gradient Checkpointing"]},{"keyword":"Linux","resume_sources":["Linux • Docker • AWS"]},{"keyword":"Docker","resume_sources":["Linux • Docker • AWS","Docker with async task queues."]},{"keyword":"AWS","resume_sources":["Linux • Docker • AWS","AWS EC2, Django, NGINX, MySQL"]},{"keyword":"A100 GPUs","resume_sources":["A100/H100 GPUs • Slurm","64 A100 GPUs with 92% compute efficiency.","on A100 clusters."]},{"keyword":"H100 GPUs","resume_sources":["A100/H100 GPUs • Slurm"]},{"keyword":"Slurm","resume_sources":["A100/H100 GPUs • Slurm"]},{"keyword":"CUDA","resume_sources":["Python • C++ • CUDA"]},{"keyword":"C++","resume_sources":["Python • C++ • CUDA"]},{"keyword":"Python","resume_sources":["Python • C++ • CUDA"]},{"keyword":"Bash","resume_sources":["Bash • C"]},{"keyword":"C","resume_sources":["Bash • C"]}]

calls.prompt:
Given these skills extracted from a resume and a job description, select the TOP 10 most relevant skills for this job.

Skills from resume:
["JAX", "PyTorch", "XLA", "vLLM", "TensorRT-LLM", "HuggingFace Transformers", "Triton", "CUDA Runtime", "NCCL", "cuDNN", "NVIDIA Nsight", "xprof", "FSDP", "DeepSpeed", "Tensor Parallelism", "Pipeline Parallelism", "Gradient Checkpointing", "Linux", "Docker", "AWS", "A100 GPUs", "H100 GPUs", "Slurm", "CUDA", "C++", "Python", "Bash", "C"]

Job description:
Mem...

Search this user's X/Twitter posts for any content related to: C++

For each relevant post you find, classify it:
- "yes": Post demonstrates real expertise/deep knowledge (detailed technical insights, original work, teaching others)
- "could_be": Post shows interest but unclear depth (sharing articles, asking questions, surface-level comments)
- "no": Post suggests lack of knowledge (asking basic questions, admitting unfamiliarity)
